body.name: ViewSonic OMNI VX2718-2KPC-MHD 27 Inch Curved 1440p 1ms 165Hz Gaming Monitor with Adaptive Sync, Eye Care, HDMI and Display Port, Black
features: CURVED DESIGN: 27 Inch QHD (2560x1440p) 1500R curved gaming monitor with thin bezels
MAXIMIZED GAMEPLAY: 165Hz refresh rate and 1ms MPRT response time (with DisplayPort) for ultimate gaming experience
ULTRA-SMOOTH GAMING: AMD FreeSync Premium technology enables fluid and tear-free gameplay
ENHANCED VIEWING COMFORT: Flicker-Free technology and Blue Light Filter for reduced eye fatigue
GAME ON: An arsenal of pre-set customizable visual modes keeps you ready for any FPS, RTS, or MOBA games
body.description: With an immersive 1500R curved screen and stunning WQHD 2560 x 1440 resolution, the ViewSonic® VX2718-2KPC-MHD monitor provides an incredible viewing experience for work or play. With features including a high 165Hz* refresh rate, 1ms (MPRT) repsonse time and adaptive sync technology, this monitor virtually eliminates screen tearing and stuttering for a fluid gaming experience. The VX2718-2KPC-MHD also comes equipped with ViewSonic exclusive ViewMode™ presets, which offer optimized screen performance for different home entertainment applications such as watching movies, editing files, or playing video games. Two HDMI (v2.0) inputs, and one DisplayPort (v1.2) input offers flexible connectivity for both general use and entertainment. *165Hz refresh rate with DisplayPort.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ViewSonic VX2718-2KPC-MHD Curved Gaming For the Modern Gamer

Immersive Curved Screen Design A sleek, concave screen with ultra-thin bezels delivers an incredibly immersive viewing experience with panoramic images, vivid color, and incredible detail. 165Hz Refresh Rate With a swift 165Hz refresh rate, this monitor delivers smooth frame loading and breathtaking graphics no matter how quickly the in-game action unfolds. Rapid Response Time With a 1ms (MPRT) response time, this monitor delivers smooth images without streaking, blurring or ghosting. Built-in varying response rates automatically correct overshooting and motion blur. Smooth & Fluid Gaming With VESA Adaptive-Sync connectivity, this AMD FreeSync Premium monitor seamlessly synchronizes the frame rate output between your graphics card and monitor to easily eliminate image tearing. Optimized View Settings Choose from “Game,” “Movie,” “Web,” “Text,” and “Mono” presets with ViewMode. These presets enhance gamma curve, color temperature, contrast and brightness for an incredible viewing experience.

Stunning Quad HD Resolution At 4x the resolution of a 720p panel, and almost twice that of a 1080p display, QHD delivers a sharper image, with no distortion or stretching, all while maintaining the same 16:9 aspect ratio. Loaded with Connectivity DisplayPort and HDMI inputs give you the freedom and flexibility to connect to a variety of devices such as gaming consoles, laptops and more. Ultra-Wide Viewing Angles Next generation viewing technology creates an ultrawide 178° field of view so you never to have to miss another shot, picture or moment. Frameless Design Enjoy a stunning multi-monitor viewing experience and see more of what matters with a sleek almost frameless design.

Previous page Eye Care Flicker-Free and Blue Light Filter help to reduce eye fatigue over extended periods of viewing. VESA Compatible Mount Mount the monitor as you see fit using its convenient VESA-compatible mount design. Next page 1 Eye Care 2 VESA Mount

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture quality
reviews.reviewText: Picture Quality is great but the internal speakers are not the best quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for the price
reviews.reviewText: for 220 dollars you are getting a great budget 1440p gaming monitor. its amazing for gaming the only issue I have is it doesn't come with a built in crosshair like my other monitor other than that it works amazing and I would recommend this to a friend who is new to gaming or that is on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Screen is great. Curved is the best. High res and easy to see. Love the blue light filter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars El monitor calidad-precio que tu dinero puede comprar
reviews.reviewText: Aun no puedo creer que pude conseguir un monitor a este precio con estas características que sea tan fiable y duradera como esta. Llevo mas de un año con el y nunca me ha presentado fallos y mejora mucho la estética de mi estación computador de mesa. Su calidad e imagen por su precio es demasiado buena aunque hay que ajustar un poco la imagen a través del software de la tarjeta grafica de tu pc para mejor el brillo ya que de forma nativa es algo oscura. También tiene algunas falencias a la hora de reproducir colores muy oscuro ya que se nota una especie de granulado extraño que entorpece la imagen pero solo ocurre en casos muy específicos que no comprometen mucho la experiencia de video. Para videojuegos, no necesitas mas de lo que te ofrece este monitor, sin duda tu mejor opción si solo deseas jugar. También, gracias a que es una pantalla curva, ayuda mucho a la calidad visual e inmersividad y te ayuda a descansar los ojos. Incluye también un parlante en la parte posterior que si bien no es de la mejor calidad, cumple su trabajo, no se le puede exigir mas ya que por le precio del monitor ya es demasiado bueno que tan siquiera incluya un altavoz. En resumen, a pesar de que tenga un par de falencias como lo es de que forma nativa la pantalla es un poco oscura y que no reproduzca bien los colores negros en ciertas ocasiones, sin duda lo volvería a comprar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Borderline scam for what it is. Bad for gaming.
reviews.reviewText: For like $30 more you can pick up the IPS version of this monitor (non-curve). This monitor is bad for gaming due to the MVA panel - lots of ghosting (smears trailing behind moving objects on the screen). 1ms mode (when enabled) halves the brightness of the screen. It has 1ms response times in name only, and it isn't something you'd actually want to use. $220 is way too much for a "gaming" monitor this bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great monitor so far! Only flaw is the speakers but I’m used to my monitors not having audio so it’s not a big deal to me! In my experience I was easily able to set it to 165hz and the quality is awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Be warned: speakers are awful (everything else is great)
reviews.reviewText: If you use your monitor speakers for conference calls, you will likely need to budget for external speakers. These are by far the worst speakers I've ever had in a monitor. The sound is faint and tinny. Very hard to hear.

reviews.reviewTitle: Really good quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: The one I was looking for my set up, really good image quality, colors and immersionI use it as a second monitor with my MacBook Air m2 and Xbox series S, on both quality it’s amazing, really recommend
La calidad de los colores es muy buena.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good monitor, very good price!
Me gusta el monitor, su calidad, precio imagen esta muy bien.
Prijs/kwaliteit een super monitor.Ook de buiging is echt een meerwaarde. Dit bij video en bij tekst
